name: Avocado Chicken Salad
description: A delicious and healthy salad made with tender chicken and creamy avocado, mixed with fresh greens and veggies.
instructions: Combine avocado, yogurt, lime, garlic powder, black pepper, and salt in a medium bowl. Mash the avocado to desired consistency.
Add onion, celery, jalapeño, and chicken into the avocado mixture and stir to coat evenly.
Serve on toast with optional topping of sriracha and cilantro.
